page.title: 13BUILDINGS CLAPHAM NEW HOUSES
page.content: We went to see the new houses at the top of Clapham.There were 5 houses and they were joined together.These houses were built for the Rowntree Trust and are intented for first time buyers.The row was called Clapdale Way.Two of the houses had stone on the walls outside and the other three had rough cast cement .They had different porches aswell.The porches on the cemented houses were like half a roof and the other porches were like whole roofs.On the cemented houses the stone was showing round the doors and windows.The houses had stone bits which the chimney came out of.The slates on the roofs were probably man made.The frames for the porches were wooden.The porches did not have walls or doors.The chimney pots were quite tall.They were made from rusty coloured clay.
